Hi all,

I have been messing around with a framework idea for Java for the =
past 4 months and finally 
have been able to make it publicly available. It=
's called RESTEasy, and you can read more 
about it here:

http://resteasy.=
damnhandy.com/

At present, it's very much a work in progress and has many =
rough edges and typos. It utilizes 
JAXB2 quite heavily and integrates very=
 nicely with JPA and Hibernate 3. It should be noted 
that JAXB will not be=
 a requirment. Curious to hear anyones thoughts.

Ryan-
